talk_text: Heh heh heh. I'll show Kaya-P and the boss I'm no pushover!
You're helping me choose these words too, you know.
A  brawler never backs down from a fight! Let's do this!
Linking words on stone tablets... You have the wildest ideas, Inori.
I don't lose any fight, whether it's with fists or words!
Mrghhh... (Me hungry...)
Mrrghhhh. (This game fun.)
Mrrrghhhhh! (Inori nice girl!)
Even against you, Kaya-P, I won't hold back!
Hell yeah! Let's go all out, no holds barred!
Kaya-P, this is your last chance to say sorry!
Sure it's not you who should be begging for mercy?
Kaya-P, brains are stronger than brawn nowadays.
Hold it! Don't make it sound like I'm an idiot!
Now, let's show off what we can do!
Mrghh! (All right!)
Good boy... If you play well, I'll give you a chocolate treat!
Mrghh! (I love choc'late!)
Hey, Inori... Have you forgotten why we're doing this?
Of course I remember! It's to defeat you and prove we're the smartest!
Even against you, I'm not going for anything less than gold!
Good! I won't hold back, so neither should you!
Heh... You're not half bad at this.
You're doing better than I thought, too!
Hey, Pseudo-Dragon?
Mrghh?! (Eek!)
Maaaan, I'm real sorry about back there! Hahaha!
Mrghhhh... (Kaya-P is scary...)
Hey, big guy... You've got a really dumb face, huh?
Mrghh... (Look who talking.)
Mrgh... (Me hungry. Want choc'late.)
What's that? You sleepy?
Mrghhh... (This girl... dangerous.)
Hm? What's that? You wanna become my underling or something?
Mrghh... (Kaya-P is musclehead.)
Hey. I didn't like the sound of that growl!
Hey, how long are we doing this for?
Until you give up and admit defeat!
Mrghh! (Surrender now!)
Mrghh! (Inori. Give choc'late.)
Oh, all right. But don't eat too much, OK?
He's really taken to those chocolate treats, huh...
Mrghh! (Me not lose to Kaya-P!)
Hm? What's that? You feeling hungry?
...She doesn't understand a word he says.
